home.headline: Your personal Social-Media Plattform

features.headline: Features
features.subtitle: The Ocelot.social platform offers the following features

features.newsfeed: Newsfeed: See whats happening in your community
features.map: Map: See where your members are located
features.groups: Groups: Organize content and members in Groups
features.followers: Followers: Follow users you find interesting

more.headline: More

featurs.notifications: Notifications: Notify Users via Email and in App based on groups and followers
featurs.promote: Promote: Promote your content and push it to the top
featurs.connect: Connect: Join group/Follow user on invite
